build.name: Chameleon Build for 19,20,21
build.description: Build for 19, 20 and 21 Super Customizable and NOT bloated with addons. I do include all the popular repos and 70+ backgrounds

build.name: Dabs Shield Build ( ANDROID )
build.description: Dabs Shield Build is based on the Fentastic skin. It has many netflix style widgets and works best with FEN. The build also has a working EPG ( TV GUIDE ) with LIVE TV via Mad Titan Addon. This build is for HIGH END DEVICES WITH GOOD INTERNET connection. Give it 1 to 2 mins to load widgets and epg. **THIS IS A TEST BUILD** May Need To Reboot Kodi again to get LIVE TV to populate

build.name: Otto Lite
build.description: Otto Lite - Bloat free, fast and ultra reliable.
